amendment.description: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for the authorization of reimbursements for all medicare part B services furnished by certain Indian hospitals and clinics.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 973 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 973 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S8337; text: S8337) To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for the authorization of reimbursements for all medicare part B services furnished by certain Indian hospitals and clinics.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 973 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
